backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, affected files, components, and test IDs confirming removal of music and photos and updates to asset docs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides brief descriptions of all frontend Valentine app files and their roles after removing music and photo features.
frontend/ASSETS.md: Explains that the app no longer uses photos or music and offers guidance for customizing messages, colors, and animations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining Valentine color palette and dark-mode variants.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing page navigation, loading overlay, and ambient layer.
frontend/src/features/valentine/componen: Renders ambient animation container and bouncing teddy using useAmbientAnimations.
A button that jumps to random screen positions when clicked.
Full-screen loading overlay with pulsing heart and fade-out animation.
Empty placeholder file; music UI removed.
Empty placeholder file; image component removed.
Styled wrapper around shadcn Button using Valentine theme classes.
Layout wrapper with themed background, card container, and footer attribution.
Dialog showing celebratory message and emojis when the user selects Yes.
frontend/src/features/valentine/hooks/us: Hook spawning and cleaning up falling hearts, sparkles, roses, kisses, and cursor hearts.
Empty placeholder file; background music logic removed.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Implements five sequential Valentine-themed pages with text, buttons, and a final Yes/No interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom Valentine-themed color variables and animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and utilities, including Valentine-specific color mappings.
project_state.json: Describes project configuration, feature requirements, and architectural notes for the Valentine-themed web experience.
